protein.specific_function: Transfers mannose from GDP-mannose to dolichol monophosphate to form dolichol phosphate mannose (Dol-P-Man) which is the mannosyl donor in pathways leading to N-glycosylation, glycosyl phosphatidylinositol membrane anchoring, and O-mannosylation of proteins.

reference.reference_text: Tomita S, Inoue N, Maeda Y, Ohishi K, Takeda J, Kinoshita T: A homologue of Saccharomyces cerevisiae Dpm1p is not sufficient for synthesis of dolichol-phosphate-mannose in mammalian cells. J Biol Chem. 1998 Apr 10;273(15):9249-54.
